TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ProcessesTraceSourceExtensions extends System.Object

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult`1<class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Processes.IImageSectionDataSource> UseImageSections(class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource trace) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function UseImageSections (trace As ITraceSource) As IPendingResult(Of IImageSectionDataSource)

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Docs.summary: Provides data from a trace about the sections of an image.
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data from the trace about the sections of an image.
Docs.remarks: Windows Performance Analyzer provides this data in various places such as the Section Name column of the CPU Usage (Sampled) table.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult`1<class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Processes.IProcessDataSource> UseProcesses(class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource trace) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function UseProcesses (trace As ITraceSource) As IPendingResult(Of IProcessDataSource)

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Docs.summary: Provides data about processes active during a trace as well as their images and PDBs.
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data about processes active during the trace as well as their images and PDBs.
Docs.remarks: Windows Performance Analyzer provides this data via the Processes and Images table as well as Symbols Hub.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult`1<class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Processes.IThreadDataSource> UseThreads(class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource trace) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function UseThreads (trace As ITraceSource) As IPendingResult(Of IThreadDataSource)

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Docs.summary: Provides data about threads active during a trace.
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data about threads active during the trace.
Docs.remarks: Windows Performance Analyzer provides this data via the Thread Lifetimes table.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult<Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Processes.IThreadDataSource> UseThreads (this Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource trace, bool useLegacyImplementation = false);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.IPendingResult`1<class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.Processes.IThreadDataSource> UseThreads(class Microsoft.Windows.EventTracing.ITraceSource trace, bool useLegacyImplementation) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function UseThreads (trace As ITraceSource, Optional useLegacyImplementation As Boolean = false) As IPendingResult(Of IThreadDataSource)

Docs.param: The trace from which to access the data.
Whether to use a legacy implementation to retrieve this data.
Docs.summary: Provides data about threads active during a trace.
Docs.returns: A pending result that, after the trace is processed, provides data about threads active during the trace.
Docs.remarks: Windows Performance Analyzer provides this data via the Thread Lifetimes table.
